item.title: Report X-2024040776
item.description:
Report X-2024040776

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-12
  • City: SAINT ROSE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: As the package was being offloaded a leakage was noticed from the package. The package was immediately placed inside a hazmat bin and brought to the hazmat cage for further inspection. DescribePack: Upon inspection a loose cap on one of the bottles was found that caused the leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: to help mitigate the effects of the release the package was separated from the rest of the packages immediately after and placed inside a hazmat bin.
